147  /*
148  * Function for the energy balance at the surface. Works only when the
149  * surface_feature gas radiation is on. Otherwise the Tenv can be imposed
150  * to compute the far field incoming radiation.
151  */
152  void setGasRadHeatFlux(const double* const m_gas_rad_heat_flux);
153 
154  /*
155  * Function for the energy balance at the surface. Works only when the
156  * surface_feature solid_conduction is set to input. Otherwise conduction is
157  * computed based on the steady state model or it is neglected.
158  */
159  void setSolidCondHeatFlux(const double* const m_solid_heat_flux){}
